website_summaries.verdict: This compact air fryer size is perfect if you're limited on space.
pros: Rapid air technology allows for very little oil to be used cooking crispy, fried foods
Once cooking time has been reached, the Air Fryer will automatically shut off
The non-stick FDA-certified and PFOA free pan and detachable basket make cleaning easy and more time for family dinners
cons: Users reported the air fryer malfunctioning after little usage

customer_reviews.title: Makes more sense to spend the extra money to get a better brand
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product, until it stops working... I used it one time and the chicken came out okay, A little soggy but okay... The next day I tried to use it again and the equipment would not power on... I called the customer service number over and over and got no response... Complete waste of time and money...
customer_reviews.author: Akiena Westbrooks

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this machine! I’ve been cooking all my meat and potato with it. Simple, fast and clean. No more oil splatters on the stove top. The meat turned out charred and juicy! A must-have gadget for lazy cooks. It also came with a little recipe book that has 50 recipes that you can do. I’ve used it 10-20 times so far, all parts remained intact.
customer_reviews.author: fandifandi

customer_reviews.title: Cooks like an indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I’ve cooked chicken breasts, pork chops, frozen french fries, and frozen breaded shrimp and have been satisfied with the results. The pork and chicken were crusty on the outside and moist inside. The fries and shrimp appeared and tasted as if the were deep fried. I wish the suggested cooking time table on page 13 in the “Owners Manual” was more informative but after some trial and error attempts I’ve made personal notes for me tastes. Additionally, there are symbols & cooking times on top of the cooker that do not have any references in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fries!
customer_reviews.text: Look, I love fries. Curly, steak, shoestring, crisscut, all of them! I spent $79 on this thing just to make fries & I am NOT disappointed! Sure, I've made other items in it such as a grilled cheese and chicken nuggets but I mainly use it for fries!! Just throw those bad boys in the tray, set the timer & walk away then come back to air fried deliciousness. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Monique

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and Clean Up Is Simple
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this for a while so I broke down and bought it. I love my new air fryer.I have made french fries several times and they were excellent! I have also made grilled corn on the cob, pork chops and they came out perfect. Easy to clean and use. Great time saver as well! Works beautifully and cooks foods fast. Best of all minimal clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: ... gym told me about air fryers and how much better they are for your health
customer_reviews.text: The guy that runs our local gym told me about air fryers and how much better they are for your health. I picked up this one because of the price but I am going to tell you it has been well worth the monty and I have only had it two weeks. I am cooking everything in it. I even made healthy potato chips the other day. The grilled cheese sandwiches are amazing, and anything that you would normally fry tastes 100% better with this product. In two weeks I have not even used my stove at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Size matters some times
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Just wish it could cook more at one time. This would awesome for a single person or someone who was the only one in the house on a diet. You are not feeding a family hot wings out of this bad boy. If that's what you want go for the larger model.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this airfryer soooo much. So far I tried to fry fish cakes & egg rolls. It works very well. The egg rolls are so crunchy & delicious. The most important part is I don’t have to use a drop of oil. It’s so cool. My husband can’t eat oily food... now with this air fryer, he can eat all fried foods that he didn’t have a chance to eat for a long time. I will try to fry tofu & other foods next time. I bought 2 of them...1 for my cousin & 1 for myself. We both love them. Thanks to seller.
customer_reviews.author: QHogan

customer_reviews.title: But it now!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this life changing appliance for a few months now and it has exceeded my expectations. If you haven't added it to your cart by now you're crazy. Super easy to use with the digital display. Super easy to clean. And oh man the food is delicious. This is my first air fryer and I chose the smaller design because I have a small kitchen and I'm typically only cooking for myself unless my son is home from college. He absolutely loves it too! Best. Wings. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P

customer_reviews.title: Quit heating after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to start with... basket did quite fit perfectly but it worked... easy to clean and use.... however now a little over 3 months later it all of the sudden quit heating and cooking food. We used it maybe 1 time a week, always pulled out and ventilated. Contacted company but no but no longer under warranty.. I'm sorry this should work longer than that not happy with this product and will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, gets way more use than I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing and use it all the time. Honestly, the deciding factor for me was the color. I was delighted to find that it’s a great little machine. It’s easy to clean and works well. Our use is pretty basic. We use it primarily to reheat pizza, hot sandwiches, etc. and to cook frozen mozzarella sticks, fries, and chicken strips. You know, all the stuff that’s bad for you. It is way better than baking that stuff, not quite as good as deep frying. It’s easier than deep frying, that is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy;
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer and I love it! Everything I have heard about air fryers is true I wish I had bought one sooner. Everything I have made in here has turned out amazing. Its a nice size for my family of 3. I can fit 3 large boneless chicken breast in at once without them touching. My son loves fries so it is so easy throwing a handful of frozen fries in here and cooking them for 7 minutes;
customer_reviews.author: malaika t.

customer_reviews.title: Very Compact!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this airfryer so much since receiving it back in January, we have done anything from French fries to chicken fingers to mozzarella sticks and more! This appliance is so lightweight & so easy to use- awesme product if you don't like greasy fried food! Fast service & fast delivery- Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It’s ready to go right out of the package, after the 5 minute “warm up”. The color was exactly as described and I love it. The time frame recommendations are a great addition as well as the 100 recipe book included. French fries were made extra crispy and not greasy and burgers were evenly cooked but slightly crunchy on the outside. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney L

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BUY ON SALE
customer_reviews.text: So I got this on sale for less than $50. I don't recommend buying this or any air fryer at full (and ridiculously high) regular price because you just won't use it enough. Yes, it makes delicious, grease free "fried" chicken breast or tenders, pork chops, but still, I only use it a couple of times a month. I mean I just don't even want to make "french fries" and stuff often. DO NOT USE FOR STEAK, it just doesn't work well no matter what the recipe books say.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Makes crispy fries, tater-tots, onion rings and did the steak as well. Its small enough to fit in cupboard when cooled and not in use. Best of all it doesn't heat up the whole kitchen like a conventional oven would. Only wish it were dishwasher safe but it cleans up pretty easily. CON: Use instructions lack how you pull out tray half way through to flip food. I just halved the cooking time for that adjustment. That's a little annoying. Recipes in the cook book are lame so don't let that be your influencer to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nekoatl

customer_reviews.title: I'm cooking more!
customer_reviews.text: I know people that have air fryers I've been saying I will get one forever! I'm so glad I did! It is kind of small but I make it work probably better for a smaller household but it doesn't take long to cook most foods so if you need to empty and refill it's fine. I have cooked salmon it was so good and had a little crust which I loved....my son loves mozzarella sticks and fish sticks. I have also made chicken wings and French fries tonight I will be trying chicken fajitas!
customer_reviews.author: Daniellesawake

customer_reviews.title: A very useful small appliance for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: I have truly enjoyed my Go Wise Air Fryer! The versatility never ceases to amaze me! I hardly use my Microwave or my Stove/Oven any longer! Food tastes so much better when heated in the Air Fryer! And it looks so good on the counter! Especially,my Purple one!My only disappointment is that the Teflon coating on the Pan under the Basket has been peeling off on a regular basis~exposing the silver metal finish beneath.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Quick cooker for smallish items
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. Cooked chicken with no problem. Made a couple of grilled cheese sandwiches--the top slice of bread got blown off--didn't make a mess tho. Only problem (and it's completely my fault) is when I was showing my wife how easy things were, I pushed the basket removal button while holding the assembly over the floor--bottom container released and fell to the floor and cracked a couple of places--but everything still cooks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B King

customer_reviews.title: Best air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this air fryer. I can fit enough food in it for my husband and I for a whole meal, OR I can make a bunch of chicken to meal prep. Everything comes out nice and crispy. I did a bunch of research on air fryers to find one that is really good but still affordable and this was the one I went with and I'm super happy with it! You definitely need this in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mere

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp spot
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this but I was disappointed that the basket would not slide in properly; however, the biggest problem was that where the plastic comes together under the basket was misaligned creating a very sharp spot. I reached out to the company who offered to replace it but then re-contacted me that they didn't have any in stock. So, now I am past Amazon's return period and almost two months later I am still waiting for GoWise to get them back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Flutter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this air fryer!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer and have already recommended it to several people. It is so easy to clean since there is no oil involved. I cooked bacon in it this last Sunday and it was perfect, super crispy and the best part was I had no mess to clean up or stove to wipe down afterwards. Made chicken wings for a get together that we were having and they turned out moist and delicious. Looking forward to seeing what else I can make in my air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I've made all year!
customer_reviews.text: Love how fast food cooks and how the food is so tasty & healthy. Try veggie tots, sweet potato & regular fries, chicken tenders or steak..perfection!. Season your way, everything comes out perfect. I live alone and work 60 hours a week, so no reason or time for lengthy cooking. Although this air fryer does small portions fine, but would work for a couple very well. Also, easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this air fryer. I couldn't believe how easy and good can make the food using this. I always hated fry things because all the mess and time, now is so simple easy and no mess. I maked french fries, chicken nuggets, corn nuggets and mozzarella sticks and they were delicious. Is very helpful the chart that is included to know the temperature and time. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DO0930

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Cooking at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: My only con for this fryer is that I should have got the 5.8qt. This unit is so versatile. I've baked biscuits and donuts in it, cooked pork chops, chicken, sausage and shrimp. All taste just as good as if it were deep fried. I'm going to try BBQ chicken tonight so if you want an air fryer, this is a great model but I would also recommend the 5.8qt now that I know what this unit can do.
customer_reviews.author: TheRaven

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Air Fryer.. have cooked frozen French Fries, Frozen Fish Sticks, and canned Cinnamon Rolls. Everything has turned out perfectly. Don't have to wait for the oven to heat up and cooking time is greatly reduced. The air fryer is easy to clean, only giving 4 stars as the basket has issues releasing from the base. Sometime it just will not budge, so I have to wash with the basket and base still together. Overall this is a good product and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use at any age
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my dad. It is very simple to use. The basket size is adequate enough for him and my mom and he liked the ease of use and the handy cookbook that accompanied the purchase. Product looks good and performs well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but Not as Versatile as an Insta-Pot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, food is great & cooks quickly. But, wish it had a solid basket too for foods with sauces or broth. Takes up lot of counter space for the small volume of food it cooks. Circumference is limiting for food sizes. Wish I had bought a more versatile instapot with rectangular interior & pressure cooker capability.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Love My Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: I love my airfryer! My friends had one and kept telling me how great it was. I finally broke down and got one. I cook everything in it. I cook a lot of single meals, so it works better than a stove most times. I throw fries in it, chicken, shrimp, etc. It cooks most of everything in less than ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Daugherty's In Charge

customer_reviews.title: Have had for 4 months, still love it
customer_reviews.text: Love not having to turn on oven. Have done, frozen fries, donuts from biscuits in tube, frozen chicken patties and fish, breaded eggplant. And maybe a few more things. Love the ease of clean up, just wipe out with paper towel. Got small one as just hubby and me. Just right size for us. Cooks in a fraction of the time. Great for quick meals.
customer_reviews.author: tallblonde

customer_reviews.title: Air Frying - Easy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my Mom after using a different model for the last year. She lives alone and hates to cook for herself. But, she's been intrigued by how easy our air fryer has been to use, and how great the food tastes. She's a cardiac patient, so the health benefits of air frying will be great for her too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Basket handle is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this only about 6 months and both the screws that hold the handle to the fryer basket have come off. They both fell into my food so I fixed it but it's just not great quality and I'm sure it will continue to happen. It's dangerous since each time it happened was right after I removed it from the main machine and the basket was hot and swinging around
customer_reviews.author: AGill

customer_reviews.title: This won't even make it a year buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in July as 2018. Worked well in the beginning for the first couple months did it took a lot of time for it to warm up and start working correctly and eventually it just started falling apart and now it doesn't work at all. They also have poor warranty customer service. Buyer beware this is a consumable product.
customer_reviews.author: landen ely

customer_reviews.title: Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have learned that I have to cook things longer than the guide recommends. The beep that it makes when entering time and temperature, and when it's finished cooking, is extremely loud and ear piercing. Other than that, the item is great. It cleans easily, looks pretty, and fits nicely in the corner of my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly. Compact. Easy to clean. Seems to good to be true. Haha... made crinkle fries for a dinner for two and they came out perfectly. Heated up frozen pizza rolls. 💯 Can’t wait to try Something more creative.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Pope

customer_reviews.title: Non Stick Came Off
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer is easy to use but the non stick came off after a couple of months. I do not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Mattison

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Small size is good for batches
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Small size is good for batches. It's easy to use and easy to clean. I was skeptical, but it does a good job at frying foods as a regular fryer. French fries come out awesome. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Grimace73

customer_reviews.title: does everything it supposed to do. One complaint i ...
customer_reviews.text: does everything it supposed to do. One complaint i have is: it is very confusing whether you has turn the unit off or not. It has only one on off button and one indicator light. If the light is solid unit is on, flashing light means unit is off. I can never remember if i has turn the unit off or not as it has almost 30 sec. Delay once you hit the off button.... It gets really confusing and i keep hitting the power button...
customer_reviews.author: Sar Yung

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer works well and is easy to use. It is also easy to clean. However I had it only about a month when the non stick coating started to come off. The basket was always hand washed without any abrasive. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put down the grease!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cooking appliance and I own a, crockpot, indoor grill, and a toaster/convection oven. It makes cooking EVERYTHING so easy. Got my mom one for Christmas after I realized mine was the greatest thing ever. Immediately threw out my grease.
customer_reviews.author: kella

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you always protect the basket and be careful shutting the basket
customer_reviews.text: We like the way it cooks. This is the second one I purchase. The first one I use at my house the second one is for my son to use at his house. They both have issues when closing the basket. I had to order a new basket for the one I use at home because it started shedding the coating. I was able to get it replaced under the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes cooking fast
customer_reviews.text: After using for a few weeks I cant imagine not having it. Cooks all sort of food fast and not having to wait for it to warm up before using like the oven is convenient. It's a good size...not to small but big enough for the 2 of use. Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: You need an air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Air fryers are a dream!! I can’t believe I never knew the magic of one. The teal color is my absolute favorite. I wish this was bigger it could fit more! Nonetheless, I know they make bigger sizes but was surprised by the size. I love making fries in here. They are restaurant quality and this is easy clean up for you on a quick dinner night.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Put it on a trivet
customer_reviews.text: I love this appliance but if you buy it, put it on a trivet, or something between the unit and your counter. The heat cracked my Corian countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer does everything you need for quick, crispy, flavorful, food
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is easy to use. It has a great completion signal that you can hear throughout the house. Foods come out crispy, not limp. We cooked frozen french fries and they came out like those cooked in a fast food restaurant. Fried fish that's reheated comes out crispy and delicious just like the day you cooked it. The unit fits well on the counter and it looks great. You can get various colors. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using this. It’s versatile and easy to use. Crisps my bacon and my chicken thighs.
customer_reviews.author: YCumbess

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks good. Order one with the 6 inch accessory kit ...
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks good. Order one with the 6 inch accessory kit as there isn't much you can do with out it. Also order perforated steamer papers. You need to experiment as there are not that many good air fryer cook books out there.
customer_reviews.author: LHR

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this product
customer_reviews.text: Huge appliances for the kitchen counter... Has a funny electrical sort of smell when you’re cooking... Fries were OK but not as crispy as they say they are going to be
customer_reviews.author: Linda V

customer_reviews.title: What a Shame
customer_reviews.text: I bought my air fryer in March of this year. I have a year's warranty, but it says I am beyond the window to return it. Anyway, I loved it. It was beautiful. I loved air-frying. It color coordinated with my kitchen. However, after it was about two month's old the coating in the basket began wearing off. I don't know how much of it I ate. This week it broke down completely. It doesn't heat up anymore. I am so disappointed. I'm going to call tomorrow and see if I can get a refund or another one. Do I want another one?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a hot date!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great I've started eating more vegetables. I love the enticing smell of French fries premeating through the air like nobody's business.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: The basket does not close properly!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a great quality air fyer. The basket will not close flush to the body of the unit. Only one side would shut properly and the other side protruding. I just got this last Wednesday. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Makes cooking so easy & quick. Perfect for days when it’s way too hot to use the oven. Had for a few weeks & so made cheesecakes, brownies, chicken, roasted veggies, and bacon!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: 10 days?
customer_reviews.text: I had this for literally 10 days used 4 times and the coating is already coming off. Guess what's going back?
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Set it. Easy use.
customer_reviews.text: Used to make hot dogs, sausages, burgers, and chicken. Very versatile to grill veggies and redo frozen fries. Need to experiment with time and size of items. Check the burgers cook throughly. Easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: buy a gigger one
customer_reviews.text: I do almost all my cooking in my air fryer now. The big mistake I made was not getting a big enough one. Now I have to buy a second one, which will really speed up my cooking time for the average meal.
customer_reviews.author: Emory

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I'm in LOVE!!!! So easy to use... fast & easy peasy!!! I love the color. I love the size (2.75 QT)
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Never heard of this brand before but it had good reviews and a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this brand before but it had good reviews and a decent price. My 2 sons use it a lot and they are really happy with it. I love the color and we all love the ease of clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Annette L

customer_reviews.title: I really like this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer. It it easy to use. I use it everyday to cook veggie burgers, garlic, kale chips, potato chips, etc. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't shut off when food is done, so if the timer is set for 5 minutes and the food is done in 4 minutes it won't shut off for another minute. It could be that I haven't figures it out yet though. I wish it came with a cover though to stop the kale chips from blowing onto the heating element. I would buy it again. The purple color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: kellie benway

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This product is life altering...especially for someone like me, who is constantly burning her tofu. I can set it and forget it with this air fryer and focus on cooking other things like rice and veggies while my tofu is always golden brown and the perfect texture. I also love that I don’t need to add oil :-)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: We love this air fryer. Perfect size for our family of 4. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I bought it so my teenage son could easily warm up food. French fries come out crisp and tasty! We use it to reheat food all the time and it is amazing. I also love making kale chips in it. I have not tried many meat recipes yet, but the chicken wing recipe that came in the recipe book is amazing. I highly recommend this product. It is easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using an air fryer and I love it so far. Relatively easy to use and clean. I’ve made everything from chicken legs to roasted potatoes to bacon and everything has been delicious. I look forward to trying many other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rach Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and heat completely before cooking food to get the plastic smell out. Then have you spray bottle of oil. It works safely and beautifully while camping in our Travel Trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the item
customer_reviews.text: I just want to know why the inside got so rusted . I can not use it no longer . Because the way it looks . look at the pictures how rusted .will like my refund back .
customer_reviews.author: Etherlinda

customer_reviews.title: Lazy fryer lol
customer_reviews.text: Great for fries and small chicken fingers if you don’t won’t to use grease to fry. Will not cool large pieces of food very well but great for finger food
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parker

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: This contraption is the best money I’ve ever spent on a kitchen appliance. Color is beautiful and I absolutely love the fact that the timer and heat control a digital
customer_reviews.author: RiverSong

customer_reviews.title: Love my blush air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I love that my food is crispy and the oil is at the bottom of the pan. It is super easy to clean, plus the oil didn’t stick to the bottom since I waited two days to clean it because of laziness. I truly love my blush air fryer, I didn’t use the oven for almost two weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I basically only ate microwave food until I got this thing. Now I can cook chicken wings, steak, shrimp, all very easily and without much effort. It’s fairly easy to clean and can do much more than “frying”. It’s great with frozen snacks like pizza rolls or soft pretzels. My only wish is that I’d gotten a bigger one, this guy only holds about 8 chicken wings without stacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Box

customer_reviews.title: Compact size for 1-2 and easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new my air fryer and happy to cook. I was looking for a small size for myself and I found a perfect size for myself. I bought a ninja air fryer but I returned as size was big :( . I like simple design in white, too !
customer_reviews.author: Sara  Lee

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! To me, fries taste better cook in this than they do with oil!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Gma

customer_reviews.title: Works Great BUT...the basket coating falls right off
customer_reviews.text: Like all the other reviews, the basket coating starts coming off after a few uses. I still use it but it could be a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: So far really enjoying using this air fryer. It cooks food as expected. Like digital display for temp and time. It’s been easy to clean. So far no problems and recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: wispat2

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but was very small
customer_reviews.text: Was a little to small bought a bigger one and loved it even more.
customer_reviews.author: patty smith

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for myself for my birthday and I love it!!! I got the Teal color and I love how it looks in my kitchen. I also love the amount of things I can make in it!! It is definitely something I have wanted for awhile now and I am so glad I finally purchased it and I would definitely recommend it to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love my purple air fryer. I also love that's its digital. My previous air fryer had a knob to turn the timer on n it sometimes got stuck and burned food
customer_reviews.author: Tanae Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Kitchen Addition!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little gadget. Had itfor only two days but it looks as though it will be used often Made bagged fries-nice and crispy. Burgers with high quality ground beef...burgers cooked up looking more like giant meatballs but nice taste. Will be making fried cod and yam chips from scratch this evening. Not the latest model but it does the job for now. Oh yes, clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lintuf

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Works awesome!! My friend remarked it works better than hers which is a more expensive brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Air fryer! I love the color and how well it cooks everything perfectly! And it’s incredibly easy to use. I do not like however, how after awhile it gets hard to use the eject button to get the inner portion out of the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina hill

customer_reviews.title: My Go To!
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous. It is a gadget that is used almost daily. Cleaning is fairly easy if you don’t let things crust over. Do wish it had an on/off switch rather than unplugging it to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: LAJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken gift
customer_reviews.text: I just got this item as a gift from my husband and it won’t allow the temperature or settings to be changed. Very disappointed in the product that have so many high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nyree McGlothin

customer_reviews.title: Don't follow directions
customer_reviews.text: This fryer works well when you don't follow directions of lining the basket with foil. Lining the basket made my chicken more like baked than fried. Flipping the chicken makes the breading come lose.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Function is fine, get rust very quickly
customer_reviews.text: It cooks food very well, i really liked it, until i used third time and washed third time, found rust on inside of screw. I think it is hazardous that cooking appliance gets rust so quickly. I did not put this one in water long time at all. Just cleaned as the manufacturer instructed. Thankfully, Amazon offered immediate return/refund. Maybe, mine was just lemon. Good luck for your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rare reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Frequently use it
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for anything that you would normally deep fry and a healthier option. Food comes out crisp on the outside and soft and tender on the inside. While I will always prefer deep fried food this is the closest thing to one that cooks food in a healthy manner. I use this product at least once a week and it never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Costanza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Seller and Product
customer_reviews.text: It's so Awesome!! And Just as Seller Stated. I enjoyed Shopping through this Seller. Thanks. Product worth buying Food tastes amazing and cuts cooking time in Half. Healthier and time saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing
customer_reviews.text: I actually want to cook with this thing. It's easy to set, use and clean. Especially for snacky food. Oven quality snacks in microwave time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fries
customer_reviews.text: At first ,I was hesitant to purchase but I am so glad I did. It is a great investment for your health. No oil required; for home made fries just cut the potato, soak in olive oil for a couple of seconds, retrieve with tongues, put them in air fryer basket and you get fries that are amazingly tasty. Soo easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting food
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and easy to use food comes out crispy I always y s used my microwave and the food was n ever crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait longer before leaving a review but this week after my first time using it (to make mediocre burgers) I noticed the front plastic piece on the basket had broken off. So now it doesn’t seal all the way. I am beyond the return window because I waited too long to try it. So disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor & color
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for a wonderful price, and it also cooks very evenly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MWSWEEPEA

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food
customer_reviews.text: I Loved it, its a perfect way to fry your food without using oil. now i can eat healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Isis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I loooove everything about this air fryer!! The color, the size.... it fits enough food perfectly! Pizza, fries, chicken strips, garlic bread... the possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful...
customer_reviews.text: Works great...I use it all the time...Stakes and chicken breast delicious....I bought my Mom one...
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter and her fiance and they absolutely love it! The first night they made wings and sweet potato fries and posted it on facebook. She said it was delicious and it looked amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Daughter2005

customer_reviews.title: 2Gud2btru
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made. I love this air fryer & the results that I have been getting. So far so GOOD! Plus, I received a recipe book with all types of food! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: attachments....
customer_reviews.text: This Air fryer is good for one person and your not wanting to have a lot of options using it. You cannot get attachments for this size air fryer. If you’re wanting to use this for making lots of foods, get the size larger as the attachments will fit. I wish I had known at the time I bought this one
customer_reviews.author: Karen McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and makes cooking a lot easier!! A much needed addition to the kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Try hot dogs!
customer_reviews.text: So far they make the best hot dogs. Just like on a grill. I made sweet potato fries which also turned out good. I am looking forward to trying more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Delores J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. Frozen onion rings are the best! I made egg rolls that turned out great. I have used Pam on the inner basket to prevent sticking, and it worked great. Best dish so far was basalmic/olive oil marinated chicken. Crispy skin and juicy interior
customer_reviews.author: virginia masters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer so much, that I cook everything in it! It has become my go-to item in the kitchen. Everything comes out crispy and it is not cooked with oil! I don't understand it, but, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few days ago & I literally use it everyday! I've cooked bacon, potatoes, steak, chicken, and garlic bread in it. It's a wonder machine & the fact that it's pink AND matches my kitchen? Even more perfect! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Love Unity

product_meta.title: GoWISE USA 2.75-Quart Digital 50 Recipes for Your Air Fryer Book, QT, Black
product_meta.description: Size:2.75 QT| Color:BlackThe GoWISE USA air fryer allows you to enjoy your favorite fried snacks and food without the added calories. With a wide temperature range of 175°F - 400°f, the fryer allows you to prepare a variety of dishes from crispy fries to juicy wings with little to no oil, and in 30 minutes or less. This air fryer is designed to automatically turn off when the basket is removed from the air fryer or after the timer is done.
feature_bullets: Healthier cooking in 30 min Or Less: thanks to rapid air technology, you can now experience your favorite food without the extra calories. This air fryer can fry, bake, grill and roast with little to no oil.

Easy to use controls: set the time and temperature using button controls. Set the temperature to 175F - 400F and cook from 1 – 30 minutes. 30-Minute timer will automatically switch to standby mode when complete.
Fda-certified and PFOA-free: comes with a non-stick FDA-certified and PFOA-free air fry pan and basket with a cool touch handle and button guard to prevent accidental detachment.
Recipe book included: Includes 50 recipes specifically made for GoWISE USA air fryers. Get started today with 50 step-by-step recipes to explore all that your new kitchen gadget has to offer.
